name: Alien Hunter (Ol Roody)
description:
Welcome to Alien Hunter! This is a throwback to those high-speed classic arcade games of the late 80s and early 90s! 

Try to reach the final boss! Unlock the secret easter egg (if you can find it!) And beat your highest wave/highscore !

Controls: Aim the cursor on the screen to determine direction to fire, and press space to thrust forward. Left mouse click to shoot!

Thank you so much for playing, and please send all feedback to me at OLROODY@gmail.com!

Thank you and happy gaming!
